Summary: Hovering light in nightsky, changed direction and flew away. made no sounds at all
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsSat on platform, saw a light in nightsky.. light was far away, but pointed in our direction. Gave the light some flashes with our flashlight (big one with powerful beam) ufo turned direction and flew over the forrest.. made no sounds at all, there was no wind.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Garstedt
This sighting has never been favorited.
